attributes.action: SCRAP CAR TAX and Incorporate vehicle excise duty VED into fuel tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car tax be abolished and transfered to fuel tax.
benefits  
1. pay as you use, you dont use you dont pay
2. you cannot avoid the tax (unlike road tax dodgers)
3. The more economical your vehicle the less tax you pay.
4. reduction in DVLA staffing with no need for enforcement staff
5. Foreign visitors will pay a cost towards road usage when they buy fuel
6. foreign lorries also pay a tax when they buy fuel.
7. If two people own similar cars they will pay different amounts for use if one is a low mileage user and the other a high mileage company rep.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
